verses.verse: And thou, <WH859> son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> take <WH3947> thee a sharp <WH2299> knife, <WH2719> take <WH3947> thee a barber's <WH1532> razor, <WH8593> and cause it to pass <WH5674> upon <WH5921> thine head <WH7218> and upon <WH5921> thy beard: <WH2206> then take <WH3947> thee balances <WH3976> to weigh, <WH4948> and divide <WH2505> the hair.

Thou shalt burn <WH1197> with fire <WH217> a third part <WH7992> in the midst <WH8432> of the city, <WH5892> when the days <WH3117> of the siege <WH4692> are fulfilled: <WH4390> and thou shalt take <WH3947> <WH853> a third part, <WH7992> and smite <WH5221> about <WH5439> it with a knife: <WH2719> and a third part <WH7992> thou shalt scatter <WH2219> in the wind; <WH7307> and I will draw out <WH7324> a sword <WH2719> after <WH310> them.
Thou shalt also take <WH3947> thereof <WH4480> <WH8033> a few <WH4592> in number, <WH4557> and bind <WH6696> them in thy skirts. <WH3671>

Then take <WH3947> of <WH4480> them again, <WH5750> and cast <WH7993> them into <WH413> the midst <WH8432> of the fire, <WH784> and burn <WH8313> them in the fire; <WH784> for thereof <WH4480> shall a fire <WH784> come forth <WH3318> into <WH413> all <WH3605> the house <WH1004> of Israel. <WH3478>

Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> This <WH2063> is Jerusalem: <WH3389> I have set <WH7760> it in the midst <WH8432> of the nations <WH1471> and countries <WH776> that are round about <WH5439> her.

And she hath changed <WH4784> <WH853> my judgments <WH4941> into wickedness <WH7564> more than <WH4480> the nations, <WH1471> and my statutes <WH2708> more than <WH4480> the countries <WH776> that <WH834> are round about <WH5439> her: for <WH3588> they have refused <WH3988> my judgments <WH4941> and my statutes, <WH2708> they have not <WH3808> walked <WH1980> in them.

Therefore <WH3651> thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Because <WH3282> ye multiplied <WH1995> more than <WH4480> the nations <WH1471> that <WH834> are round about <WH5439> you, and have not <WH3808> walked <WH1980> in my statutes, <WH2708> neither <WH3808> have kept <WH6213> my judgments, <WH4941> neither <WH3808> have done <WH6213> according to the judgments <WH4941> of the nations <WH1471> that <WH834> are round about <WH5439> you;

Therefore <WH3651> thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Behold, <WH2009> I, even <WH1571> I, <WH589> am against <WH5921> thee, and will execute <WH6213> judgments <WH4941> in the midst <WH8432> of thee in the sight <WH5869> of the nations. <WH1471>

And I will do <WH6213> in thee <WH853> that which <WH834> I have not <WH3808> done, <WH6213> and whereunto <WH834> I will not <WH3808> do <WH6213> any more <WH5750> the like, <WH3644> because of <WH3282> all <WH3605> thine abominations. <WH8441>

Therefore <WH3651> the fathers <WH1> shall eat <WH398> the sons <WH1121> in the midst <WH8432> of thee, and the sons <WH1121> shall eat <WH398> their fathers; <WH1> and I will execute <WH6213> judgments <WH8201> in thee, and <WH853> the whole <WH3605> remnant <WH7611> of thee will I scatter <WH2219> into all <WH3605> the winds. <WH7307>

Wherefore, <WH3651> as I <WH589> live, <WH2416> saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Surely, <WH518> <WH3808> because <WH3282> thou hast defiled <WH2930> <WH853> my sanctuary <WH4720> with all <WH3605> thy detestable things, <WH8251> and with all <WH3605> thine abominations, <WH8441> therefore <WH1571> will I <WH589> also diminish <WH1639> thee; neither <WH3808> shall mine eye <WH5869> spare, <WH2347> neither <WH3808> will I <WH589> have any pity. <WH2550>

A third part <WH7992> of thee shall die <WH4191> with the pestilence, <WH1698> and with famine <WH7458> shall they be consumed <WH3615> in the midst <WH8432> of thee: and a third part <WH7992> shall fall <WH5307> by the sword <WH2719> round about <WH5439> thee; and I will scatter <WH2219> a third part <WH7992> into all <WH3605> the winds, <WH7307> and I will draw out <WH7324> a sword <WH2719> after <WH310> them.

Thus shall mine anger <WH639> be accomplished, <WH3615> and I will cause my fury <WH2534> to rest <WH5117> upon them, and I will be comforted: <WH5162> and they shall know <WH3045> that <WH3588> I <WH589> the LORD <WH3068> have spoken <WH1696> it in my zeal, <WH7068> when I have accomplished <WH3615> my fury <WH2534> in them.

Moreover I will make <WH5414> thee waste, <WH2723> and a reproach <WH2781> among the nations <WH1471> that <WH834> are round about <WH5439> thee, in the sight <WH5869> of all <WH3605> that pass by. <WH5674>

So it shall be <WH1961> a reproach <WH2781> and a taunt, <WH1422> an instruction <WH4148> and an astonishment <WH4923> unto the nations <WH1471> that <WH834> are round about <WH5439> thee, when I shall execute <WH6213> judgments <WH8201> in thee in anger <WH639> and in fury <WH2534> and in furious <WH2534> rebukes. <WH8433> I <WH589> the LORD <WH3068> have spoken <WH1696> it.

When I shall send <WH7971> upon them the <WH853> evil <WH7451> arrows <WH2671> of famine, <WH7458> which <WH834> shall be <WH1961> for their destruction, <WH4889> and which <WH834> I will send <WH7971> <WH853> to destroy <WH7843> you: and I will increase <WH3254> the famine <WH7458> upon <WH5921> you, and will break <WH7665> your staff <WH4294> of bread: <WH3899>

So will I send <WH7971> upon <WH5921> you famine <WH7458> and evil <WH7451> beasts, <WH2416> and they shall bereave <WH7921> thee; and pestilence <WH1698> and blood <WH1818> shall pass <WH5674> through thee; and I will bring <WH935> the sword <WH2719> upon <WH5921> thee. I <WH589> the LORD <WH3068> have spoken <WH1696> it.
